attributes.title: Nope nope nope nope
attributes.review: Do not waste your time with this. First, a BURNT orange, Cheeto is the first thing you see... like I donâ€™t want to see that, like ever. Then you make an account and BOOM, you get spam phone calls about Trump and UNRELENTING notifications. Even when you try to turn them off, they keep getting on their knees, asking for a vote and theyâ€™ll do it for ANYTHING (and I mean anything ğŸ˜‰). I guess thatâ€™s a benefit. But, if you look at the ratings and reviews from others, I relate and understand how frustrating the app is; crashing, not user friendly, not American enough, not sexist, racist, white supremacist, bigot, ignorant, selfish, soulless enough for the app. I mean COME ON! We need that! Thatâ€™s how everyone sees him, so WHY arenâ€™t they advertising it?! Anyways, horrible, terrible, huge mistake, worst invention in the history of America. -100000/10.
